ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was particularly annoyed at this too, and, I think it s the main reason we miss so many notes on our 40+ songs.  I have a feeling the code tests against
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, Nov 20/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> i was curious. i have been thinking more about this lately. do all the
> pure caster classes have their casting skills (e.g. evocation) max out at
> 255? along these lines, what skill caps do the priests (shaman, cleric,
> druid) and hybrids (ranger, shadow knight, paladin) have? i am almost
> positive the pure casters max at 255, but i am not sure on the other casting
> classes. and in our petition, was anything mentioned about our four song
> skills capping at 255 instead of 200? i can easily understand that they
> should in fact cap at 200, was just wondering what everyone else thought,
> and if it was mentioned.

I was particularly annoyed at this too, and, I think it's the main
reason we miss so many notes on our 40+ songs. I have a feeling the
code tests against Level x 5 + 5 for the skill check and doesn't make
allowances for the skill cap. It seems the logical explanation for why
our 40+ songs are so hard to start.

--
